products.title: Lakai Flaco 2 Shoes Red Canvas
products.body_html: Stevie's new shoe is an evolution of his previous style with upgrades. The Flaco 2 fits Stevie's style perfectly with it's classic and clean silhouette. The upper consist of co-bound suede in high-wear areas and bold branding. Our advanced PARA-MOUNTª outsole technology utilizes dual density cushioning to absorb high impact. The Hex-tread design combines 360 degree flexibility for increased board feel and maximum grip. Reinforced in the arch area for added protection and support. The DELUX-LITEª sockliner uses premium foam is designed with a deep contoured heel and arch for superior comfort.

products.title: ES EOS Shoes White/ White
products.body_html:
The reimagining of a classic. The team at éS has taken the original EOS design, a trusted standout in skate footwear for over a decade, and retooled it for today’s demanding skater. All the amazing features and function of the original have been kept: durable ollie pattering, 400NBS cupsole, sidewall stitching, strong brand representation and eyecatching heel striping. Along with all this we’ve added thinned out padding for excellent board feel, and perfected fit for improved security and control and a stiffer heel cup for increased support.

  • Circular toe cap pattern for increased durability
  • 400NBS rubber cupsole
  • Durable sidewall stitching
  • Minimal tongue and collar padding
  • Minimal construction for better board feel
  • Lycra tongue centering straps
  • Breathable mesh tongue
  • Leather/Synthetic

products.title: TENTREE Joshua Hemp Shorts Gargoyle Grey
products.body_html:
Elastic waist-band? Tons of pockets? Easy to wear? Check, check, and check. Our Hemp Joshua Short is made of a super soft, super sustainable hemp blend that will have these shorts being a closet MVP on those warmer spring and summer days.

  • Model is 6'1" Chest 39, Waist 32, wearing size M
  • Relaxed, Midweight Hemp Polyester
  • 53% Hemp, 44% Recycled Polyester, 3% Spandex
  • Fixed waist short, 7" inseam, 2 front pockets, 1 back pocket, hemp and recycled polyester blend with a bit of stretch
  • This fabric has a little spandex built in for movement and comfort. Refer to our size guide to find your perfect fit.
  • Wash cold, hang dry

products.title: REEF Fanning Sandals Grey/ Volt
products.body_html: This is the sandal of legendary three-time world champ and perennial pro surfing powerhouse, Mick Fanning the ultimate athletic sandal of comfortable water-friendly synthetic nubuck upper. Mick relies on the contoured injection molded Eva footbed with anatomical arch support and full 360-degree heel airbag enclosed in soft poly for good reason. And in the fun department, it also features a churchkey built into the footbed to open your soda after a surf or hanging at the pool. Reef Icon Herringbone rubber outsole. The sandals of a champion.

products.title: REEF Fanning Prints Sandals Grey Swells
products.body_html: How you become a legend: work, sweat, repeat. Surfing great Mick Fanning inspired this hard-working flip flop. With a synthetic nubuck upper, padded liner, compression molded footbed with a heel airbag, plus herringbone rubber outsole with built-in bottle opener to celebrate success.

products.body_html:
Visually and legitimately stacked with features… The Mirage Stacked 2.0 is knee-length, pigmented printed, and made with Mirage Core Fabric for epic durability and stretch.
  • 19” outseam

products.title: VANS AUTHENTIC LITE CHECKERBOARD
products.body_html:
Additional Information:

Vans The Canvas Authentic Lite has reengineered the iconic Vans low top style using innovative construction methods to improve comfort, increase flexibility, and reduce the overall weight. Featuring sturdy 6 oz. canvas uppers, added heel cushioning, and UltraCush Lite sockliners for long lasting comfort, the Authentic Lite offers a new lightweight fit and feel while maintaining the classic aesthetic of the original style. 

PLU: 23338

products.title: ROARK Layover Trail Travel Shorts Camo
products.body_html:
A new and inspired 18” outseam adventure short now constructed of 4-way stretch, providing a quick drying and durable experience. The latest Layover Trail short now features a self stowing back pocket so you can pack tight and always have a trusty counterpart on hand. The short also features a drawstring closure waistband with zipper fly and front extended long zip pocket with internal stash sleeve intended to accommodate all adventure goods. Back patch pocket with button closure and small stash pocket at back yoke for quick cell phone storage.

Features
  • Durable 4-way stretch
  • Drawstring travel waist and zip fly
  • Oversized adventure zip pockets with mesh drainage
  • Button closure patch pockets at back
  • Packable into back right pocket
  • Cell stash pocket
  • Outseam: 18”
  • Inseam: 7 ½"

A new and inspired 19” outseam travel short. Drawstring closure waistband with zipper fly and front extended long zip pocket with internal stash sleeve intended to accommodate all travel documents. Back patch pocket with button closure and small stash pocket at back yoke for quick cell phone storage. Back yoke vented mesh panel for breathability and comfort.

Features

products.title: ROARK Passage Boatman Boardshorts Military
products.body_html:
Originally designed for the Jamaican Orcabessa Sanctuary Fishing Wardens, with mixed fabric construction and 4-way stretch body paneling with non-stretch durable Nylon Supplex in the back and thru the waistband. Nylon Supplex adds durability for extended wear. Side zipper pocket with internal drainage holes and side utility tool pocket. Specifically placed seam angles drive performance and eliminate chafing and seam obstruction.

Features
  • A concept in durability and function
  • 4-way stretch front body
  • Durable nylon supplex back panel and waistband
  • Forward angle sideseam
  • 19” outseam
Materials + Care

products.body_html:
The Hurley Explore Phantom + Apex Shorts are made to move with you while the mesh elastic waistband keeps you comfortable. With mega mobility, durability, and quick-dry fabrics these will quickly become your go-to no matter where you are going.

Details

  • Body: 86% recycled polyester/14% spandex
  • UPF 50+ sun protection

  • Breathable mesh elastic waistband with 2-way drawcord closure

  • On-seam zip pocket at wearer’s left hip
  • Screen-printed logo

products.title: SMITH Scout MIPS Snow Helmet Matte French Navy 2022
products.body_html:
Bombshell durability. Check. MIPS® multi-directional impact protection. Check. The Smith Scout ski and snowboard helmet blends everyday hardshell durability with the latest impact-absorbing tech so you can dial in your bag of tricks in the park or anywhere on the hill. Because no two people are the same, its lifestyle fit adapts to your head. Pull the ear pads come spring, or add a beanie on the coldest storm days. No matter the weather, eight fixed vents keep the air flowing for fog-free goggles and climate controlled comfort. All-season certification means you can wear it in the skate park and on your bike, too.

Protection

  • Advanced ABS construction for increased impact protection and all-around durability
  • MIPS® Brain Protection System reduces rotational forces caused by angled impacts to the head
  • Select colorways offered without MIPS® system
  • Certification: ASTM F 2040 CE EN 1077:2007 CLASS B
  • Dual-certification all-season use

Fit / Integration

  • Designed for ultimate integration with Smith goggles for maximum comfort and venting
  • AirEvac™ ventilation system integrates with Smith goggles for fog-free lenses
  • Self-adjusting lifestyle fit system flexes to match your head shape for maximum comfort
  • Removable bombshell ear pads for form-fitting comfort

Features

  • Eight fixed vents for consistent airflow
  • Removable goggle strap lock for streamlined shell when goggles are worn under helmet
  • Beanie compatible
  • Weight (Size M, MIPS®): 18 oz / 500 g

Size Chart

  • S 51-55cm
  • M 55-59cm
  • L 59-63cm
  • XL 63-67cm

products.title: BERN Macon 2.0 MIPS Snow Helmet Black 2022
products.body_html:
Nobody wants to ski with a fishbowl on their head. It would be terrible for the health of the fish, plus it would provide little-to-no protection in the event of a crash. That’s where the Winter Macon 2.0 comes in, ready to shred straight out of the box. This thing features our no-fuss EZ Fit system, Mips rotational injury protection liner, and our staple low profile design. Don’t let the name fool you, the Winter Macon 2.0 comes locked and loaded with everything needed for year-round shredding, including a winter knit kit for below freezing temps and a summer liner designed for warm days on the bike. Honestly, just writing this product description has us ready to run through a brick wall, but that totally voids the warranty so we’re just gonna go skiing instead.

Avg. Weight 376 Grams
Construction ThinShell
Fit System EZ Fit
Vents 12

products.title: SMITH Scout Jr. MIPS Kids Snow Helmet Matte Cloud Grey 2022
products.body_html:
Bombshell durability. Check. MIPS ® multi-directional impact protection. Check. The Smith Scout Jr. ski and snowboard helmet blends everyday hardshell durability with the latest impact absorbing tech so young skiers and riders can focus on progression in the park or anywhere on the hill. Because no two kids are the same, the fit adapts to different head shapes. Pull the ear pads come spring or add a beanie on the coldest storm days. No matter the weather, eight fixed vents keep the air flowing for fog-free goggles and climate-controlled comfort. Certified for snow and bike wear, the Scout Jr. is the only helmet a kid needs.

Product Details

  • Advanced ABS construction for increased impact protection and all-around durability
  • MIPS ® Brain Protection System reduces rotational forces caused by angled impacts to the head
  • Certification: ASTM F 2040 CE EN 1077:2007 CLASS B, CPSC, CE EN1078
  • Dual-certification all-season use
  • Designed for ultimate integration with Smith goggles for maximum comfort and venting
  • AirEvacâ„¢ ventilation system integrates with Smith goggles for fog-free lenses
  • Self-adjusting lifestyle fit system flexes to match your head shape for maximum comfort
  • Removable bombshell ear pads for form-fitting comfort and audio-compatible
  • Eight fixed vents for consistent airflow
  • Removable goggle strap lock for streamlined shell when goggles are worn under helmet
  • Weight (Size YM, MIPS ®): 18 oz / 500 g
  • LIFETIME WARRANTY

products.title: VOLCOM Bolinas Stoneys 19" Boardshorts Black
products.body_html:
It's time for some free thinking, free wheelin' with the Bolinas Stoneys surf trunks for men. Channeling retro NorCal vibes into a 19" medium length stretch boardshort with pop color tie-dye for ayahuasca vibes, these bad boys don't just take a stand in the style stakes, they're crafted with a stretchy lightweight blend featuring eco-friendly hemp so you can take sustainability to the lineup too.
  • Stoneys fit
  • 19" outseam
  • 4-way stretch
  • Signature double woven patches
  • Back patch pocket with flap
  • Stoney Cinch Fly
  • Bungee loop in back pocket

products.title: VOLCOM Lido Plus Mod-Tech 20" Boardshorts Black
products.body_html:
Lido Plus Trunk is the best way to get your surf on or whatever ocean activity you may do. Keep comfortable in these high performance boardshorts that are water resistant and come with Volcom's Stone Shield technology -think of them as little pillow like stones wicking water away from your body while reducing friction. The perfect pair shorts for all you adventurers out there who want something stylish yet practical at the same time.
  • Stone Shield with 45% REPREVE Recycled Polyester / 45% Polyester / 10% Elastane 4 - way stretch with DWR
  • 20” outseam 4 - way stretch boardshort
  • Signature woven labels
  • Wet zip pocket
  • Cinch fly technology

products.title: LAKAI Newport Hi X Sabbath Shoes Black/Gradient Suede
products.body_html: Inspired by the infamous Never Say Die Album. Black suede /canvas with gradient highlights on upper. Album artwork patch on tongue with matching footbed along with printed art on outsole sidewall.
